title: feat: add elevenmusic model with duration-based billing
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Added the 'elevenmusic' model to audio endpoints, enabling music generation with custom duration and instrumental options.
gist.impact: Users can now generate music tracks from 3 to 300 seconds with transparent duration-based pricing.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee as a DJ/producer in a cozy studio, adjusting a duration slider on a mixing desk to control a glowing lime green waveform.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee wearing headphones, adjusting a slider on a retro mixing console to extend a glowing lime green (#ecf874) audio waveform. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi studio vibes. Pixel text 'elevenmusic'. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee wearing headphones, adjusting a slider on a retro mixing console to extend a glowing lime green (#ecf874) audio waveform. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi studio vibes. Pixel text 'elevenmusic'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
